import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets the book with the searched title from Google Books API
getBook:function getBook(book){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q="+book);},// Gets all saved books from our database
getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},// Saves a book to our database
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);},// Deletes the book with the given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);}};
